<h3 id="X32117">X(32117) = INCENTER OF THE 6th BROCARD TRIANGLE</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (b+c)*a^4-(b^2+c^2)*a^3-(b+c)*b*c*a^2+b^2*c^2*a-(b^3+c^3)*b*c  :  :
